title: 3D Sports Advertising
shortDescription: Place your sponsorship brand in a 3D perspective on or around the field of play.
fullDescription: Our 3D Sports Advertising service places your brand in a stunning three-dimensional perspective directly on or around the field of play. This innovative approach ensures your brand stands out and benefits from maximum exposure during live TV broadcasts, highlight reels, and social media coverage.

features.title: Live TV Exposure
features.description: Your brand appears in 3D during live broadcast coverage, reaching millions of viewers worldwide.

features.title: Social Media Amplification
features.description: Eye-catching 3D visuals generate organic social media shares and engagement.

features.title: Highlight Reel Inclusion
features.description: Brands remain visible in replays and highlight packages for extended exposure.

features.title: Custom Placement
features.description: Strategic positioning tailored to each sport and venue for maximum impact.
